note_text:
Name:  [**Known lastname 16456**], [**Known firstname 779**]          Unit No:  [**Numeric Identifier 16457**]

Admission Date:  [**2128-8-27**]     Discharge Date:  [**2128-9-2**]

Date of Birth:   [**2052-9-12**]     Sex:  F

Service:  ACOVE

ADDENDUM TO PRIOR DISCHARGE SUMMARY FROM [**8-31**]:

Patient's remaining hospital course included ongoing
treatment for a left lower lobe pneumonia, adjustment of her
psychiatric medication for control of agitation and further
discharge planning.

FINAL DISCHARGE PLANS:  Included transfer to [**Hospital1 **] Nursing
and Rehabilitation Center.  Patient remained afebrile and
hemodynamically stable throughout the remainder of her
hospital stay.

CONDITION ON DISCHARGE:  Hemodynamically stable, afebrile and
at baseline mental status.

DISCHARGE DIAGNOSES:
1.  Pneumonia.
2.  Transient hypotension.
3.  Delirium.
4.  Dementia.
5.  Malignant neoplasm of unspecified primary, suspected
melanoma.

DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS:
1.  Docusate sodium 100 mg 1 tablet po b.i.d.
2.  Senna tablet 1 tablet po b.i.d.
3.  Heparin subcutaneously 5000 units q. 8 hours.
4.  Acetaminophen 325 mg 1-2 tablets po q. 4-6 hours as
needed for temperature greater than 101.
5.  Oxycodone 5 mg 1 tablet po q. 8 hours.
6.  Pantoprazole 40 mg po q.d.
7.  Nystatin 5 mL swish and swallow po q.i.d. as needed for
thrush.
8.  Aspirin 81 mg po q.d.
9.  Levofloxacin 250 mg po q.d. for seven days.
10. Metronidazole 500 mg po t.i.d. for seven days.
11. Trazodone 50 mg tablet [**1-8**] tablet po q.h.s.
12. Oxycodone 5 mg 1 tablet q. 6 hours prn breakthrough pain.
13. Olanzapine disintegrating tablet, 5 mg po q.a.m., 7.5 mg
po q.p.m.

RECOMMENDED FOLLOW-UP:  The patient was advised to follow-up
with her primary care physician, [**Last Name (NamePattern4) **]. [**First Name8 (NamePattern2) **] [**Name (STitle) **], at
[**Telephone/Fax (1) 7151**] for a follow-up appointment in one week of
discharge.







                          [**First Name11 (Name Pattern1) **] [**Last Name (NamePattern4) 16018**], M.D.  [**MD Number(1) 16019**]
